name: Slimes Vs Robot 2.5D
description:
Slimes Vs Robot 2.5D is a humble tiny rogue-lite inspired by the greatest.  Run through all the rooms to the boss and collect many items to improve your charactere. You can also collect different weapons depending on how you play.

The goal of the project was to create my first 3D game with procedural rooms generation . I work alone on my free time. 

I hope you will have some good time. This is a rework from a previous game made in gameJam. Switch from 2D to 3D.

The game can be played with keybord and mouse but also with gamepad.
